sentences.sContent: Poor sleeping habits can be resolved if you are willing to look at what you do before you go to sleep, your sleeping environment and other factors.
sentences.sContent_eng: Poor sleeping habits can be resolved if you are willing to look at what you do before you go to sleep, your sleeping environment and other factors.
sentences.sCn: 如果你肯仔细关注一下你睡觉之前做的事情，你睡觉的环境还有其他因素，你就有可能改掉不良的睡眠习惯。
